segments.text: Hi , Janice . Our first weekend after being employed is coming . Show me your plan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My mom phoned me this morning , and asked me to go back home to have housework chores .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you assigned to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: God knows . Speaking of chores , I would rather do some washing than cooking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For me , I think I will iron my shirt and trousers . Actually , weekends tend to be the most hectic day in the whole week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really hope that I could sleep like a log all through two nights . But ... Some one said that weekends are a bit like rainbows ; they look good from a distance but disappear before we get up close to them .
segments.speaker: S2
